name: Yumkasaurus Warrior: Flowing Skyfire
description: A powerful warrior from the Canopy, whose bravery has been acknowledged and for which they may wear the Saurian Crown.\nA warrior who can use a grappling hook to extend their attack range. Following intricate mechanical tinkering, the handcannon they wield can be fired using said grappling hook. For the Saurian-Crowned warriors of the Scions of the Canopy, refining one's skills and thought is more important than training the spirit and will.
